title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Product name: KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat

This is small electric heater for indoor use. It is black color and easy to move. Size is 7.72 inches width, 6.38 inches depth, 9.13 inches height. Weight is 2.6 pounds. It is good for home, dorm, office, kitchen. Suggested room area about 200 square feet.

Power and modes:
- Low heat: 750W
- High heat: 1500W
- Fan mode: air circulation without heat

Heating element is PTC ceramic. It can start warm air fast, about 2 seconds. Noise is below 45 dB for quiet operation. There is built-in thermostat to adjust temperature, and simple controls on the unit. Product is portable and easy to carry.

Safety:
- Overheat protection
- Tip-over auto shut off around 45 degrees tilt
- ETL certification

Type: indoor electric heater fan. Placement on floor or desk is possible. It provides quick heat, stable performance, and low thermal resistance for efficient use. If you need compact heater for personal space, this model is practical and simple to use. Please follow all safety instructions when operating the heater.
